\partial_n(\sigma_\alpha) = \sum_{i=0}^n (-1)^i

\[%mdk-data-line={96}
\Delta_{n+1}(X) \overset{\partial_{n+1}}{\longrightarrow}
\Delta_{n}(X) \overset{\partial_{n}}{\longrightarrow}
\Delta_{n-1}(X) \overset{\partial_{n+1}}{\longrightarrow}
\cdots \overset{\partial_{1}}{\longrightarrow} \Delta_0(X).
\]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={214}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[21ca47404041bee8e54d6b6c1cdb2b3a]%mdk
$P: C_n(X) \to C_{n+1}(Y)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={214}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[51abad51c57ee8e8f7a60e8a51f4a15c]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={216}
P(\sigma) = \sum_{i=0}^n (-1)^i \eval{\qty[F \circ (\sigma \times \id_I)]}_{[v_0, \dots, v_i, w_i, \dots, w_n]}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={219}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b28bbf03d77c4d263f348ddcd3e77f40]%mdk
$\partial P = g_\# - f_\# - P\partial.$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={219}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[e83f40789618261f22328e786f8836c4]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={221}
\begin{aligned}
\partial P(\sigma) &= \sum_{j \le i} (-1)^i (-1)^j
\eval{[F \circ (\sigma \times \id_I)]}_{
  [v_0, \dots, \hat{v}_j, \dots, v_i, w_i, \dots, w_n]} \\
&\phantom{{}={}} + \sum_{j \ge i} (-1)^i (-1)^{j+1}
\eval{[F \circ (\sigma \times \id_I)]}_{
  [v_0, \dots, v_i, w_i, \dots, \hat{w}_j, \dots, w_n]}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={230}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[627d981a4b082e7396585b995ef51925]%mdk
$i=j$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={230}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[98f6398bf6ca3c5adbea1f24c1914fc5]%mdk
$i=j=0,$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={230}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[f33085e30149932b35a2ecc13507839b]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={232}
\eval{[F \circ (\sigma \times \id_I)]}_{
  [\hat{v}_0, w_0, \dots, w_n]} = g_\#(\sigma),
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={235}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[9a96383a19c760dee139fc83c97f0e8b]%mdk
$i=j=n,$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={235}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[1b62643004f74569c7e0f35ff02bb564]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={237}
-\eval{[F \circ (\sigma \times \id_I)]}_{
  [v_0, \dots, v_n, \hat{w}_n]} = -f_\#(\sigma).
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={240}

%mdk-data-line={352}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[aa25833725a95dd2ad6fe44c5c24a2a9]%mdk
$\lambda: \Delta^n \to Y$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={352}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[d6542dacaf0120b506170e660cedcc7e]%mdk
$b_\lambda$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={352}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[26ab61fa8024f78da62a405a1e574d8f]%mdk
$\Delta^n$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={352}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[c4223b63070774c8c519f4f8ef80fde6]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={354}
S(\lambda) = b_\lambda S(\partial \lambda).
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={356}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ca4f7148e09712d6ec2f25893d7c1ebf]%mdk
$S[\varnothing] = [\varnothing]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={356}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[bc59d209a5b3ab859258dfcd9d7ae7b2]%mdk
$S = \id$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={356}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c10b30af2ca82b997c02b71a76e1d330]%mdk
$n=-1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={356}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0e1176caf07d2ed21c19fc899be7e7df]%mdk
$n=0$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={358}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[13d376b82c163da5de15b99bce97e57b]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={360}
\begin{aligned}
\partial S \lambda &= \partial b_\lambda (S \partial \lambda) \\
&= S \partial \lambda - b_\lambda \partial (S \partial \lambda) \\
&= S \partial \lambda - b_\lambda S \partial \partial \lambda.
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={366}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0d09d5db3928f15e95c273466db302af]%mdk
$\partial S = S \partial$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={366}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[57e8d00c81a5e01fc6dc74de2ed2a018]%mdk
$T: LC_n(Y) \to LC_{n+1}(Y)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={366}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5dbc98dcc983a70728bd082d1a47546e]%mdk
$S$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={366}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[38249f538b50785967877e7c5400afb8]%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a166348ec58327d3a28160c617029872]%mdk
$T = 0$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={366}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c10b30af2ca82b997c02b71a76e1d330]%mdk
$n=-1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={366}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[f02de521a4fb13db1d6e03de43febb41]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={368}
T\lambda = b_\lambda(\lambda - T\partial\lambda)
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={370}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[4b152567a12fdbcd2200b4dc72f4a7ca]%mdk
$n \ge 0$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={370}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[11216912378bdf2913faa0e406ea21a2]%mdk
$\partial T + T \partial = \id - S$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={370}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[1ce9efe0a0e7a0c3dd3695714c126293]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={372}
\begin{aligned}
\partial T \lambda &= \partial b_\lambda (\lambda - T \partial \lambda) \\
&= \lambda - T\partial\lambda - b_\lambda \partial(\lambda - T\partial\lambda) \\
&= \lambda - T\partial\lambda - b_\lambda (S\partial\lambda + T\partial\partial\lambda) \\
&= \lambda - T\partial\lambda - S\lambda 
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={383}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={387}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[77e336c4e05ebdffe7290cad0969b2ef]%mdk
$S(\id_{\Delta^n})$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={387}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[76e07b0019dc2308633800eb4ec2d8fe]%mdk
$S(\Delta^n)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={387}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e4840de202160d1eb0e86093450d0124]%mdk
$S\sigma$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={387}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a2ab7d71a0f07f388ff823293c147d21]%mdk
$\sigma$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={387}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7b8b965ad4bca0e41ab51de7b31363a1]%mdk
$n$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={387}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[26ab61fa8024f78da62a405a1e574d8f]%mdk
$\Delta^n$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={387}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5dbc98dcc983a70728bd082d1a47546e]%mdk
$S$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={387}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[0bed742c6465d39dfc9e6427e519bbbc]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={389}
\begin{aligned}
\partial S \sigma &= \partial \sigma_\# S \Delta^n \\
&= \sigma_\# \partial S \Delta^n \\
&= \sigma_\# S \partial \Delta^n \\
&= \sigma_\# S \sum_{i=0}^n (-1)^i \Delta_i^n \\
&= \sum_{i=0}^n (-1)^i \sigma_\# S \Delta_i^n \\
&= \sum_{i=0}^n (-1)^i S\qty(\eval{\sigma}_{\Delta_i^n}) \\
&= S\qty(\sum_{i=0}^n (-1)^i \eval{\sigma}_{\Delta_i^n}) \\
&= S \partial \sigma
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={400}

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[11216912378bdf2913faa0e406ea21a2]%mdk
$\partial T + T \partial = \id - S$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={408}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[70b2e4d53988d3e6e5dfe2ac377030a4]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={410}
D_m = \sum_{i=0}^{m-1} TS^i
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={412}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[acb3e55fe00e6af9a6d16095f841b683]%mdk
$S^i$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={412}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[865c0c0b4ab0e063e5caa3387c1a8741]%mdk
$i$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={412}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5dbc98dcc983a70728bd082d1a47546e]%mdk
$S$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={412}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[9ef394e713e227faae2af8c607f59aff]%mdk
$D_m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={412}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[38249f538b50785967877e7c5400afb8]%mdk
$\id$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={412}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[78d7bfd21d4f391ab445da23b6a3ff0c]%mdk
$S^m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={412}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[1608843e9b5da6b42a9b087b89552f70]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={414}
\begin{aligned}
\partial D_m + D_m \partial &= \sum_{i=0}^{m-1} \partial TS^i + TS^i \partial \\
&= \sum_{i=0}^{m-1} \partial TS^i + T\partial S^i \\
&= \sum_{i=0}^{m-1} (\partial T + T\partial) S^i \\
&= \sum_{i=0}^{m-1} (\id - S) S^i \\
&= \sum_{i=0}^{m-1} S^i - S^{i+1} \\
&= S^0 - S^m = \id - S^m.
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={424}

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[928d40b749cea90c3d57b209f1c0dffa]%mdk
$C_n^\mathcal{U}(X)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={426}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[c2c850a9af4b7dd4bd88435c93368ca2]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={428}
\begin{aligned}
\rho(\sigma) &= \sigma - \partial D \sigma - D \partial \sigma \\
&= \sigma - \partial D_{m(\sigma)} \sigma - D \partial \sigma \\
&= S^{m(\sigma)} \sigma  + D_{m(\sigma)} \partial \sigma - D \partial \sigma
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={434}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[f6cfbac76f1213200e20b2740ca9e172]%mdk
$S^{m(\sigma)} \sigma$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={434}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[928d40b749cea90c3d57b209f1c0dffa]%mdk
$C_n^\mathcal{U}(X)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={434}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[42cb7a1840727ee59a35604a581f88ed]%mdk
$D_{m(\sigma)} \partial \sigma - D \partial \sigma$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={434}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b4398a4393c1f7aa762bfad075bc5074]%mdk
$D_{m(\sigma)} (\sigma_j) - D_{m(\sigma_j)} (\sigma_j)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={434}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[94006b2a5a7808d87aeae326cdebe770]%mdk
$\sigma_j$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={434}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[363b122c528f54df4a0446b6bab05515]%mdk
$j$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={434}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a2ab7d71a0f07f388ff823293c147d21]%mdk
$\sigma$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={434}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5e4d2193f27963b5f6f9599bc4676aa5]%mdk
$m(\sigma_j) \le m(\sigma)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={434}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[928d40b749cea90c3d57b209f1c0dffa]%mdk
$C_n^\mathcal{U}(X)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={436}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[d2606be4e0cd2c9a6179c8f2e3547a85]%mdk
$\rho$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={436}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[3714d0151ff63d8122bea863fb9950b8]%mdk
$\rho: C_n(X) \to C_n^\mathcal{U}(X)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={436}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[555bac372a117e13b7ce05d998e6aab0]%mdk
$\partial D + D \partial = \id - i\rho$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={436}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[3ed0cb1a50f18ace2e3256d42535d3ff]%mdk
$\rho i = \id$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={440}

$\mathcal{U} = \{A, B\}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

$f(x) \ne x$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[50bbd36e1fd2333108437a2ca378be62]%mdk
$f(x)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={526}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[d25c186e3f3096a9ff4a918f7b3141d4]%mdk
$-x$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={526}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[734b60104e47487acc009a7e79621da6]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={528}
f_t(x) = \frac{(1-t)f(x) - tx}{\norm{(1-t)f(x) - tx}}.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\]%mdk

\[%mdk-data-line={543}
(x_1, x_2, \dots, x_{2k}, x_{2k+1}, x_{2k+2}) \mapsto (-x_2, x_1, -x_4, x_3, \dots, -x_{2k+2}, x_{2k+1}).
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
